text: Huawei P8 is a Android smartphone developed by Huawei. It was released on April 2015. It has two other smartphones such as Huawei P8 Lite and Huawei P8 Max. Huawei P8 has 5.2 IPS-NEO LCD screen, 2600mAh battery capacity, 3GB RAM and 13MP wide back camera. == Software == Huawei P8 lite run Android 4.4.2 KitKat for the first time, later, it can upgrade to Android 5.0 Lollipop and Android 6.0 Marshmallow. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2015 Category:Huawei mobile phones
title: Huawei P8
